General.Name: Meritz Financi
General.Description: Meritz Financial Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides various financial services in South Korea. The company offers fire, marine, long-term, automobile, and general insurance products, as well as credit financing, asset management, etc.; and securities and OTC derivatives investment/brokerage and trading, trust, and investment consulting and discretion services. It is also involved in the provision of car financing, personal loan, and corporate financing services; real estate investment trusts management services; and commissioned management of investment trusts. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

3.Name: Mr. Gwang-Soo  Lee
3.Title: MD & Chief of Management Support Office
